title: Personalities
description: A list of AI personalities, including their preferred victory types and stat focuses.

preferredVictoryType.description: The victory type major civilizations will pursue (need not be specified in VictoryTypes.json)

production.description: Amount of focus on the stat the computer player will have on production. Typically ranges from 0 (no focus) to 10 (double focus)
